head: Swish 41
blurb: Data gathering, visualization and front-end development for a scrolly-telling, comprehensive look at every shot Mavericks great Dirk Nowitzki took in his career.

head: Pain & profit
blurb: Design and front-end development for multi-part investigation into the failings of Texas to protect vulnerable citizens from managed care companies.

head: Redistricting redux
blurb: Scrolly-telling design and development for explanatory investigation into the gerrymandered congressional districts of the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex.

head: Standoff
blurb: Design direction and project management for an in-depth look into the confrontation between Dallas SWAT officers and the Dallas Police Shooting gunman within the halls of El Centro College.

head: It’s history now
blurb: Art direction, design and development for a series of short videos and stories on those affected by the Dallas Police Shooting, one year later.

head: Overlooked
blurb: Presentation design and front-end development, including creation of a custom photo gallery, for investigative story on what happens to the children of women who go to jail.

head: The weight of a wall
blurb: Custom presentation and front-end development of geographically-based storytelling centered on what a border wall would mean for the citizens and law enforcement officers that live and work along the border.

head: Tony Romo's career, visualized
blurb: Data gathering, analysis, and visualization of every pass Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo threw to a teammate (or even, himself).

head: Kings of the clutch
blurb: Data gathering, analysis, and visualization of the Texas Rangers’ performance in one-run games over the course of the 2016 season.

head: Rolling up on Dixon Circle
blurb: Custom presentation design and front-end development of an alternative storyform for a series of vignettes on what life is like for the residents of a South Dallas neighborhood that was nearly ripped apart following a police shooting in 2012.
